languages.text: "Этот Тервантьяс, похоже, не такой мудрец, каким любит казаться, раз позволил выпустить меня из клетки. Ну, ему же хуже". {n}Гигант разминает плечи, и вы слышите громкий треск суставов. Он поднимает с пола украшенный алыми рунами боевой нож — похоже, единственное оставленное ему имущество. Взвесив его в руке и скептически нахмурившись, Волк произносит:{/n} "Добрая сталь у меня найдется, но, если мы выходим на охоту, мне понадобится моя шкура".

"It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."
languages.original_text: "Этот Тервантьяс, похоже, не такой мудрец, каким любит казаться, раз позволил выпустить меня из клетки. Ну, ему же хуже". {n}Гигант разминает плечи, и вы слышите громкий треск суставов. Он поднимает с пола украшенный алыми рунами боевой нож — похоже, единственное оставленное ему имущество. languages.text: “特万提亚斯居然要让我离开这座笼子。看来，他并不像他自以为的那样聪明，恐怕他要沦为笑柄了。”{n}他转了转硕大的肩膀，你听到他的关节发出了响亮的噼啪声。他从地上抓起了他的战刀，战刀上装饰着猩红色的符文。看起来，这是他最后一件幸免于难的装备。他用手掂了掂战刀，皱起眉头，开了口。{/n}“武器已经到手了。不过，如果要打猎的话，我还需要我的狼皮。”
languages.original_text: "It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

traits.locale_text: “特万提亚斯居然要让我离开这座笼子。看来，他并不像他自以为的那样聪明，恐怕他要沦为笑柄了。”{n}他转了转硕大的肩膀，你听到他的关节发出了响亮的噼啪声。他从地上抓起了他的战刀，战刀上装饰着猩红色的符文。看起来，这是他最后一件幸免于难的装备。他用手掂了掂战刀，皱起眉头，开了口。{/n}“武器已经到手了。不过，如果要打猎的话，我还需要我的狼皮。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: 「俺を檻から出すなんて、テルヴァンティアスも思っていたより馬鹿なんだな。間抜けな奴め」{n}大きな肩を丸めると、関節が大きく砕ける音がした。唯一の所持品と思われる緋色のルーン文字で飾られたバトルナイフを持ち上げる。手に持って重さを量り、疑い深そうなしかめっ面をしながら、狼はこう言った。{/n}「こいつも悪くないが、狩りに出るなら狼の皮が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: «Si Tervantias me va a dejar salir de la jaula, no es tan inteligente como quiere aparentar. Peor para él». {n}Estira sus inmensos hombros y oyes un sonoro crujido. Levanta su cuchillo de combate del suelo. Está cubierto de runas escarlatas y parece ser la única pertenencia que le queda. Sujetándolo, el Lobo frunce el ceño y afirma:{/n} «Ya tengo buen acero, pero si vamos a cazar necesitaré mi piel de lobo».
languages.original_text: "It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

Levanta su cuchillo de combate del suelo. Está cubierto de runas escarlatas y parece ser la única pertenencia que le queda. Sujetándolo, el Lobo frunce el ceño y afirma:{/n} «Ya tengo buen acero, pero si vamos a cazar necesitaré mi piel de lobo».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: « Si Tervantias me laisse sortir de ma cage, c'est qu'il n'est pas aussi malin qu'il aime à le faire croire. Il le regrettera. » {n}Vous entendez ses articulations craquer lorsqu'il fait rouler ses larges épaules. Il ramasse son couteau de combat qui traînait au sol. Cette arme, ornée de runes écarlates, est probablement tout ce qui lui reste. Il la soupèse un instant puis, les sourcils froncés, il ajoute :{/n} « J'ai déjà une bonne lame, mais si on part en chasse, il me faut ma peau de loup. »
languages.original_text: "It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

Il le regrettera. » {n}Vous entendez ses articulations craquer lorsqu'il fait rouler ses larges épaules. Il ramasse son couteau de combat qui traînait au sol. Cette arme, ornée de runes écarlates, est probablement tout ce qui lui reste. Il la soupèse un instant puis, les sourcils froncés, il ajoute :{/n} « J'ai déjà une bonne lame, mais si on part en chasse, il me faut ma peau de loup. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: "Anscheinend ist Tervantias nicht so klug, wie er sich gerne gibt, wenn er mich aus dem Käfig lassen will. Der Scherz geht auf seine Kosten." {n}Er rollt seine enormen Schultern, und du hörst seine Gelenke laut knacken. Er hebt sein Kampfmesser vom Boden auf – es ist mit purpurroten Runen verziert und scheint sein letzter verbliebener Besitz zu sein. Der Wolf hält es in der Hand, verzieht skeptisch das Gesicht und sagt:{/n} "Guten Stahl habe ich bereits, aber wenn wir auf die Jagd gehen, brauche ich meine Wolfshaut."
languages.original_text: "It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

languages.text: "Tervantias, kafesten çıkmama izin verdiğine göre göründüğü kadar akıllı değilmiş. Kazdığı kuyuya düşecek." {n}Devasa omuzlarını hareket ettirmesiyle eklemlerinin gürültülü çatırdayışını duyuyorsun. Kalan son eşyasıymış gibi duran, kızıl rünlerle süslü savaş bıçağını yerden alıp elinde ağırlığını tartıyor. Kaşlarını çatıp kuşkucu bir ifadeye bürünen Kurt, konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Hâlihazırda iyi çeliğim var ama ava çıkacaksak kurt derimi almam gerek."
languages.original_text: "It seems Tervantias is not as clever as he likes to appear if he's letting me out of the cage. The joke is on him." {n}He rolls his huge shoulders and you hear his joints crack loudly. He lifts his battle knife from the floor — decorated with scarlet runes, it seems to be his last surviving possession. Weighing it in his hand and wearing a sceptical frown, the Wolf says,{/n} "Good steel I have already, but if we are going hunting, I will need my wolfskin."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias, kafesten çıkmama izin verdiğine göre göründüğü kadar akıllı değilmiş. Kazdığı kuyuya kendisi düşecek." {n}Devasa omuzlarını hareket ettirmesiyle eklemlerinin gürültülü çatırdayışını duyuyorsun. Kalan son eşyasıymış gibi duran, kızıl rünlerle süslü savaş bıçağını yerden alarak elinde ağırlığını tartıyor. Kaşlarını çatıp kuşkucu bir ifadeye bürünen Kurt, konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "İyi çeliğim zaten var ama ava çıkacaksak bana kurt derim gerek."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
